title: AI-Assisted Decision
description: AI insights guide final recommendation with confidence meters.

events.title: Application Onboarded
events.details: Applicant enters details and selects AI feedback.

events.title: AI Risk Score
events.details: AI computes 38 risk score with a medium risk profile.

events.title: Recommendations Rendered
events.details: AI suggests approve with quarterly reporting.

events.title: Human Review
events.details: Reviewer validates AI reasoning and considers collateral.

events.title: Approval Decision
events.details: Decision follows AI recommendation with monitoring dashboard.

narration.text: AI highlights risk factors and confidence for the reviewer.
Final approval uses AI guidance to speed the path.
